name: School Settlement Home Attendant Service Corp

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: School Settlement Home Attendant Service Corp is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $63.1M in Medicaid payments across 296K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $63.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
